name: Falnarion Tactics II (itch)
description:
From the sequel to the Fire Emblem inspired game; Falnarion Tactics comes

Falnarion Tactics II.

The story of Nerfelo continues with Falnarion Tactics II. Revisit old areas and discover new ones. Fight alongside friends old and new as you take the role of Tolem, leader of The Black Order. A group clan-destined to defeat the totalitarian Kingdom of Inelda.

Also on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1078450/Falnarion_Tactics_II/
